MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH41 postcode area of Birkenhead, affecting properties in Charing Cross, Menai Street, Grange Road and surrounding. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:15PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:28PM on 4th December 2020
